title: Thrilling Tales: The Story of Supercuts
description:
Supercuts revolutionized the haircutting industry, and managed to stay in style as trends changed. But then came the pandemic.
Podcast production by Jess Miller and Cleo Levin with help from Grace Woodruff.
Slate Plus members get benefits like zero ads on any Slate podcast and bonus episodes of shows like Slow Burn. Sign up now to listen and support our work.
